import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useHistory, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getTemperamentsList, postDog } from '../../Redux/actions' export default function DogCreate(){ const dispatch = useDispatch() const temperaments = useSelector((state) => state.temperaments) const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: "", image:"", height_min: "", height_max: "", weight_min: "", weight_max: "", life_span: "", temperament: [], }) function handleChange(e){ setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) console.log(input) } return(

Crea tu Doggi

handleChange(e)} />
) }
